item.description:
Would you like to know exactly what your Silver Seed is and why it is VITAL to restore its capability to function before Dec. 2012?

Cloistered historical records indicate this part of our anatomy has not been working properly since the days of Atlantis, when misuse of energy by various groups created serious cataclysmic events.

Why has this information been returned to earth's planetary populations at this time?

Because the window of opportunity to restore our original organic capabililties will forever close on December 21, 2012 due to what is happening on a cosmic level.

To understand irreversable energy changes occuring on that date, view all 3 videos on the following link.  Each takes 2 hours to view, so get comfy and take notes. If you have any questions,  bring them with you. 

 http://www.KrystalSpiral.com/CamelotInterviews.htm

 

For additional info, click on the "Pages" tab above. Since it takes time to systematically employ a series of KS techniques to progressively shield against devistating 12/21/12 energies...


THE  TIME IS NOW...

to reawaken your Silver Seed and restore your natural organic bio-spiritual energy flows.  

This group is where you will learn how... and MUCH MORE!

                         ******

We will be joined by members from another group, who have already been studying Keylontic Science.

This Meetup runs from 6 PM - 9 PM. 

Please bring your own refreshments, and check this site for last minute cancellations before leaving. Especially during the winter months, there can be too much snow accumulation to allow for ample parking. 

SPECIAL REQUEST: Since space is limited, only those who have joined this group and RSVP'd "yes" can sit on a chair.  Any guests must bring a pillow to sit on the floor.  For that reason, please be sure to change your RSVP back to " no" if you can't attend, so anyone who may be on our automatic waiting list will be allowed by the Meetup system to RSVP "yes" to secure a seat. 

Also, if you wanted to come but the Meetup system would not allow you to RSVP "yes" because all seats have been assigned...

The group organizer is willing to add your e-mail address to the "Meetup Followup" summary distribution list which normally goes out to only those who have physically attended at least one time.  These details include answers to questions asked during the Meetup, including links they can refer to. 

However, group organizer does not access the e-mail address associated with this site. So using the Meetup "contact" button hereis just a waste of time, since your message will never be viewed.

Instead, please use the contact tab after bringing up www.ulcsclinic.com.

If you don't receive a reply right away, check the home page of that site for a vacation notice.  You can also try info@ulcsclinic.com, which is the only e-mail address checked by the group organizer.  However, due to filters and spam controls, that message may get deleted unread unless you enter MEETUP MEMBER in the subject line.  Thank you.

                         ******

Additional Details follow:

If time allows, the translators of this  information may later publish it in the form of a book. The (approx) title will be "Earth After 2012, Orb Whisperers, and The Silver Seed Awakening" by Ashayana Deane.

But because TIME IS OF THE ESSENCE, we are studying this info as soon as each segment is released in workshop form.

A series of "Sliders" workshops can be viewed by scrolling down on this link:

http://www.azuritepress.com/products_us/list%20pages/sliders_series.php

While viewing those titles, check out the contents of Sliders 10, 11, and 12 which will be viewed and discussed in detail during our group Meetups.

That's because this is where the detailed info on the silver seed awakening is given, including the necessary techniques. However, it is also recommended that members start studying the earlier Sliders workshops in preparation.

It is also recommended that members study Kathara, the ancient healing modality that uses Keylontic Science (KS), since this is the foundations course for all future studies of this FASCINATING information... which is all TRUE!  (ie, the KS techniques really work).

For information on New England Kathara(tm) classes, click here:

http://www.ulcsclinic.com/id5.html

The publisher's website, www.azuritepress.com is a complete resource, including our true history, the nature of creation and our multi-dimensional bio-spiritual anatomy, possible future pathways,  free techniques, DVD and CD products for purchase, music, colorful posters and much more! 

You can even click on a link on the bottom of their home page to join an e-group where you can ask questions and communicate with other Keylontic Science students all over the world!

THE IMPLICATIONS OF THIS INFORMATION ARE IMMENSE!

Definately take the time to study the details posted there, okay?  Because time does not permit us to present all those topics here.

Some of their links (definitions, etc.) will come up if you click on our pages tab above.

They also have live webinars you can register for, no matter where you live!

THIS INFO IS TOTALLY AWESOME!!!

In this study group we will be viewing and discussing the DVD workshops which explain  exactly WHAT our Silver Seed is, WHERE it is located, why it has not been functioning properly since the days of Atlantis... and how correct the mutation to restore our ancient organic capabilities... before the window of opportunity to do so closes Dec 21, 2012.

group.name: Indigo Insights: Awakening to our Full Potential

item.name: The Silver Seed Awakening
